subject: Sales
title: Your LinkedIn Is Your Storefront
description: A short lesson to help you apply Your LinkedIn Is Your Storefront.

hook.text: A buyer checks your LinkedIn before replying. A blank profile kills the deal before it even starts.

buildup.text: For B2B sellers, LinkedIn is the first storefront buyers visit. It must communicate value instantly.

discovery.text: A strong profile needs a compelling headline, a clear summary, and visible proof of results.

twist.text: Most profiles read like resumes. Buyers don't want career history â€” they want solutions to their problems.

climax.text: Rewrite your profile for the buyer. Answer one question: 'How do I help people like you succeed?'

punchline.text: Your profile should sell value, not list job titles.

quiz.question: How should a seller's LinkedIn profile be written?
options: For the buyer, focused on how you help them succeed
With as many buzzwords as possible
